title: How to Polish a Faucet With a Lemon

steps.headline: Squeeze out the juice.
steps.description: Reserve the juice for cooking uses.

steps.headline: Take the squeezed out lemon half and rub vigorously over the faucets.
steps.description: Exchange for another lemon half if you have a lot of faucets to clean.

steps.headline: Wash the tap after scouring with the lemon half.
steps.description: The faucet should shine as new.

text: Cut a lemon in half.  Squeeze out the juice. Reserve the juice for cooking uses. Take the squeezed out lemon half and rub vigorously over the faucets. Exchange for another lemon half if you have a lot of faucets to clean. Wash the tap after scouring with the lemon half. The faucet should shine as new.
